page.title: 01TRADE
page.content: We go shopping to Scunthorpe and go into the market first. Mum picks the fruit and vegetables; we have a cabbage, cauliflower, a pound of carrots and a pound of runner beans. For fruit she buys a pound of Granny Smith's apples, a pound of Outspan oranges, a pound of bananas and four grapefruits. Next we look for a meat stall and when we find one, we have a pound of pig's liver, a pound of mince and the Sunday joint; this week we are having pork. When we have done our shopping we find a toy stall. My sister gets a doll and my brother gets a space model and I got a print and colour set and a drawing book. Next we went to Asda's at Scunthorpe and when we got out of the car we got a trolley for our shopping. When we had finished we paid the lady.
